description: The UE in state 5GMM-DEREGISTERED initiates the registration procedure for initial registration by sending a REGISTRATION REQUEST message to the AMF under specific conditions.

properties.description: Triggers for initiating the registration procedure

conditions: Initial registration for SMS over NAS
UE moves from GERAN/UTRAN to NG-RAN coverage after GPRS attach/routing area update or 5G-SRVCC without successful EPS attach/tracking area update/registration procedure
Initial registration for onboarding services in SNPN
Initial registration for disaster roaming services
Initial registration to come out of unavailability period and resume normal services

properties.description: UE sends REGISTRATION REQUEST message to AMF

parameters: Requested NB-N1 mode DRX parameters IE
Payload container IE (UE STATE INDICATION message)
UE determined PLMN with disaster condition IE

properties.description: UE initiates registration procedure based on triggers
REGISTRATION REQUEST message is sent to AMF
